def: Record of Rights (RoR). Main ownership register revised every 5 years.
Legal agricultural document with crop details. Contains unique Khasra Number (Plot No).
Register of Cultivators/Tenants. Arranged by cultivator holding.
Bi-annual harvest inspection by Patwari. (Rabi & Kharif crops).
Mutation. Process of changing ownership (Sale, Inheritance, Gift).
Original map drawn on thick paper/cloth during settlement.
Cloth copy of the map (Musavi) kept by Patwari for field use.
Map drawn when a Khasra number is divided (e.g., selling half a plot).
Account number of the OWNER (Malik) in Jamabandi.
Genealogical/Family tree of landowners in the village.
Village Administration Paper recording customs and rights.
